item.title: Topics I'm Interested In
item.description: This is an all-purpose note I’ll write down important links too, as well as connect to all sorts of things I want to learn more about. General Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Jobany Rosario Wood working/building Computer Science Hardware Raspberry Pi NAS Servers/server rooms Cyber security Encryption Algorithms Introduction to Algorithms BASIC Compression Email NAS/Home Server How to Start a Homelab for $0 Extras Link to Summer Job I found a pretty decent resource on Python and Machine learning.
item.content:
This is an all-purpose note I’ll write down important links too, as well as connect to all sorts of things I want to learn more about.

NAS/Home Server

Extras

Link to Summer Job

I found a pretty decent resource on Python and Machine learning.

The Odin Project: Ruby on Rails Course.

item.title: Computer Science
